title: Therapeutic effect of oral insulin-chitosan nanobeads pectin-dextrin shell on streptozotocin-diabetic male albino rats
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Hanaa Ramadan, Nadia Moustafa, Rasha Rashad Ahmed, Ahmed A.G. El-Shahawy, Zienab E. Eldin, Suhailah S. Al-Jameel, Kamal Adel Amin, Osama M. Ahmed, Manal Abdul-Hamid
